title: Game Progress Route
content:
espond with:

I would like that. Why do you say that? I don't like what you're implying... I'm trying to avoid becoming a mind flayer - I thought you agreed to protect me.

Pick the second option and he offers to evolve the tadpole in your head to the next stage, enhancing your Illithid Powers in exchange for a slight change in appearance. You can freely ask him why he can't stop ceremorphosis, after which you'll have to agree or disagree to his offer. If you disagree, he understands and hopes y
